resources.string:
Our aim privacy first ,All usage of accessibility service privileges is exclusively for the purpose of getting Question and Options from screen when these are appear to users.

This APP does not store or send any thing .

This app is developed by Shubham Tyagi.
Only works with Loco Version 2.1.9 or prior version so install any one of them,
 because after this version Loco app developer disabled accessibility
When you see question on your screen press Get Answer button
